string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n\nParticipate in #k#bMarriage, Guild, and Family#k activities! Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for active citizens. He says anyone who participates in a #bMarriage#k and a #bGuild#k, and #bhas at least 1 Junior#k, will receive the #e#bOutstanding Citizen#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n#k\n Actively participate in Marriage, Guild, and Family activities.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Outstanding Citizen#n#k\n\nYou have acquired the #bOutstanding Citizen#k title and the associated medal.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Be part of a Marriage and a Guild, and register at least 1 Junior.

#v1142081:# #e#b#t1142081##k

-Marry
-Join a Guild
-Find 1 or more Junior

#nWould you like to test yourself to see whether you have what it takes to be the owner of this medal?
You will meet friends who will join you as you participate in #bMarriage#k, #bGuild#k, and #bFamily#k activities. There are no time restrictions, so let me know when you think you're ready!
You will face many difficulties if you do not find friends to accompany you in your exploration.
